metadata.title: CVE-2021-47446 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/a4xx: fix error handling in a4xx_gpu_init() This code returns 1 onerror instead of a negative error. It leads to an Oops in the caller. Asecond problem is that the check for "if (ret != -ENODATA)" cannot be truebecause "ret" is set to 1.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
